Plot: A boy and a girl find themselves stuck in a whirlpool of such intense love that they would do anything, go to any extent and face all odds for the one they love.
Title: Hero
Writer: Subhash Ghai (original story), Nikkhil Advani (screenplay), Umesh Bist (screenplay), Umesh Bist (dialogue)
Actors: Suraj Pancholi, Athiya Shetty, Tigmanshu Dhulia, Aditya Pancholi
